name: Pytracing Maze
description:
A simple 3D maze game, where you have to find the exit to pass to the next level, but beware of enemies.  The final objective is to obtain the highest score, you lose points when you die and the difficulty increases with the score.

The graphics are generated pixel by pixel with a crude ray tracing engine written in Python with Pygame and Numpy, accelerated by Numba, all the processing is done by the CPU. The source files are available on my GitHub and there are some videos about the development on my YouTube channel.
